results.title: Geranylgeranyl-pyrophosphate regulates secretion of pentraxin 3 and monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 from rheumatoid fibroblast-like synoviocytes in distinct manners.
results.text_hl: These results shed light on novel aspects of the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and may prove its important role in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Rheumatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012216 @@@rheumatic diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Yokota K, Miyoshi F, Sato K, Asanuma Y, Akiyama Y, Mimura T. Geranylgeranyl-pyrophosphate regulates secretion of pentraxin 3 and monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 from rheumatoid fibroblast-like synoviocytes in distinct manners. Clin Exp Rheumatol. 2011 Jan-Feb;29(1):43-9. PMID: 21345291
